author: .fjl
content: We have some hive tests for getLogs, and besu is failing them. The other clients are passing though. So I am not yet sure what he means exactly regarding the missing logs.

author: tersec
content: More broadly, https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7919 addresses this point in a way which doesn't rely on trusted bug fixes/ELs, e.g., via incorporating https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7745 or https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7792, https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7708, and https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7799
